com.atakmap.android.bluetooth

Interface BtLowEnergyManager.BluetoothLEHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PLRFBluetoothLEHandler
    Enclosing class:
    BtLowEnergyManager

    public static interface BtLowEnergyManager.BluetoothLEHandler

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes the connection but the handler can be reused
      void connect()
      Connects to the bluetooth device.
      void dispose()
      Clean up the handler, close connections and unregister associated callbacks.
      android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice getDevice()
      Returns the underlying BluetoothDevice associated with this handler.
      boolean onScanResult(android.bluetooth.le.ScanResult scanResult)
      Is called back during the scanning process.
      void setConnectionListener(BtLowEnergyManager.BluetoothLEConnectionStatus connectionStatus)
      Register the Bluetooth Connection listener with the handler.

    • Method Detail

      • onScanResult

        boolean onScanResult(android.bluetooth.le.ScanResult scanResult)
        Is called back during the scanning process. The handler is responsible for handling the results of the scan to include bonding, handling passing of the appropriate data to the TAK architecture.
        Parameters:
        scanResult - the scan result to see if it is handled.
        Returns:
        boolean if the handler will handle the btle device

      • connect

        void connect()
        Connects to the bluetooth device.

      • close

        void close()
        Closes the connection but the handler can be reused

      • dispose

        void dispose()
        Clean up the handler, close connections and unregister associated callbacks. After dispose is called, the handler can no longer be used correctly without recreating it.

      • getDevice

        android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice getDevice()
        Returns the underlying BluetoothDevice associated with this handler.
        Returns:
        the bluetooth device.

      • setConnectionListener

        void setConnectionListener(BtLowEnergyManager.BluetoothLEConnectionStatus connectionStatus)
        Register the Bluetooth Connection listener with the handler.
